PrecisRegulations Amending the EXTRA-PROVINCIAL TRUCK UNDERTAKING LICENCING REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) which update the reference to the Director for the Province of British Columbia who may authorize any person or body to determine whether an applicant meets the requirements to hold a licence.
